conclusion: Violation of Art. 11;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - award
docname: CASE OF ISMAYILOV v. AZERBAIJAN - [Russian Translation]
issue: Article 34 of the Law on Constitutional Court of 23 December 2002
